function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"HVAC interventions reducing airborne transmission","Impact":"Reduced risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and monitoring of HVAC systems","Technologies":"Air filtration and purification systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Building managers, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Incorporation of highly related review papers","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased information","Mitigation":"Peer review process, fact-checking, and verification","Technologies":"Online research databases, plagiarism detection software","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Journal editors, peer reviewers"},{"Description":"Environmental impact of FM interventions","Impact":"Negative impact on energy and emission performance","Mitigation":"Implementation of energy-efficient technologies and practices, monitoring and reporting of environmental metrics","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, renewable energy sources","People":"Building managers, environmental experts","Owner":"Facility management team, environmental consultants"}]}
